Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Match​(int id, VirtualView vv)
    The match is initialized with these; - BOARD: 5x5 cell board with all cells at 0 level - ENDED: false - STATUS: CARD_CHOICE - PLAYERS: empty list - SELECTEDCARD: empty list - LOSERS: empty list

      public Match​(int id, VirtualView vv)
